trans-unit.source: Using the PayPal Payments Standard Extension | Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Using the PayPal Payments Standard Extension | Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Používání standardního rozšíření Paypal Payments | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: Describes how to use the extension to enable customers to make payments with PayPal.

seg-source.mrk: Describes how to use the extension to enable customers to make payments with PayPal.

target.mrk: Popisuje, jak rozšíření používat, aby zákazníci mohli provádět platby pomocí PayPal.

trans-unit.source: The PayPal Payments Standard Extension

seg-source.mrk: The PayPal Payments Standard Extension

target.mrk: Standardní rozšíření PayPal Payments

trans-unit.source: Customers continuously require higher customer service, both in terms of product quality but also in terms of delivery and payment options.

seg-source.mrk: Customers continuously require higher customer service, both in terms of product quality but also in terms of delivery and payment options.

target.mrk: Zákazníci neustále vyžadují vyšší zákaznický servis, a to jak z hlediska kvality produktu, tak i z hlediska dodacích a platebních možností.

trans-unit.source: The PayPal Payments Standard service helps you increase your customer service.

seg-source.mrk: The PayPal Payments Standard service helps you increase your customer service.

target.mrk: Služba PayPal Payments Standard vám pomůže zvýšit zákaznický servis.

trans-unit.source: As an alternative to collecting payments through bank transfer or credit cards, you can offer your customers to pay you through their PayPal account.

seg-source.mrk: As an alternative to collecting payments through bank transfer or credit cards, you can offer your customers to pay you through their PayPal account.

target.mrk: Jako alternativu k inkasu plateb bankovním převodem nebo kreditními kartami můžete svým zákazníkům nabídnout, aby vám zaplatili prostřednictvím jejich účtu PayPal.

trans-unit.source: When you send a sales invoice or sales order by email, there is a PayPal link in the email body and in the attached PDF document.

seg-source.mrk: When you send a sales invoice or sales order by email, there is a PayPal link in the email body and in the attached PDF document.

target.mrk: Když odešlete prodejní nebo prodejní objednávku e-mailem, v těle e-mailu a přiloženém dokumentu PDF je odkaz PayPal.

trans-unit.source: When the customer chooses the link, the service page for their PayPal account appears showing the payment details for the sale.

seg-source.mrk: When the customer chooses the link, the service page for their PayPal account appears showing the payment details for the sale.

target.mrk: Když si zákazník vybere odkaz, zobrazí se servisní stránka pro jeho účet PayPal, kde jsou uvedeny platební údaje za prodej.

trans-unit.source: The customer can then pay the invoice as any other PayPal payment.

seg-source.mrk: The customer can then pay the invoice as any other PayPal payment.

target.mrk: Zákazník pak může zaplatit fakturu jako jakoukoli jinou platbu PayPal.

trans-unit.source: The PayPal Payments Standard service provides the following benefits:

seg-source.mrk: The PayPal Payments Standard service provides the following benefits:

target.mrk: Služba PayPal Payments Standard poskytuje následující výhody:

trans-unit.source: Customer payments arrive faster in your bank account.

seg-source.mrk: Customer payments arrive faster in your bank account.

target.mrk: Platby zákazníků přicházejí na váš bankovní účet rychleji.

trans-unit.source: Customers have more ways to pay invoices.

seg-source.mrk: Customers have more ways to pay invoices.

target.mrk: Zákazníci mají více způsobů, jak platit faktury.

trans-unit.source: PayPal offers a trustworthy payment service, which customers prefer to entering credit card information on web sites.

seg-source.mrk: PayPal offers a trustworthy payment service, which customers prefer to entering credit card information on web sites.

target.mrk: PayPal nabízí důvěryhodnou platební službu, kterou zákazníci upřednostňují před zadáváním informací o kreditní kartě na webových stránkách.

trans-unit.source: PayPal offers multiple ways of handling payments, including credit card processing, PayPal accounts, and other sources.

seg-source.mrk: PayPal offers multiple ways of handling payments, including credit card processing, PayPal accounts, and other sources.

target.mrk: PayPal nabízí několik způsobů zpracování plateb, včetně zpracování kreditní karty, PayPal účtů a dalších zdrojů.

trans-unit.source: The PayPal link can be added automatically to sales documents or manually by the user.

seg-source.mrk: The PayPal link can be added automatically to sales documents or manually by the user.

target.mrk: Odkaz PayPal může být přidán automaticky do prodejních dokladů nebo ruřně uživatelem.

trans-unit.source: The PayPal Payments Standard service does not involve monthly fees or setup fees.

seg-source.mrk: The PayPal Payments Standard service does not involve monthly fees or setup fees.

target.mrk: Služba PayPal Payments Standard nezahrnuje měsíční ani instalační poplatky.

trans-unit.source: Because it is an extension, you can easily enable the PayPal Payment Standard service when and if your business requires it.

seg-source.mrk: Because it is an extension, you can easily enable the PayPal Payment Standard service when and if your business requires it.

target.mrk: Protože se jedná o rozšíření, můžete snadno povolit službu PayPal Payment Standard, kdykoli to vaše firma vyžaduje.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Enable Customer Payment Through PayPal](sales-how-enable-payment-service-extensions.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Enable Customer Payment Through PayPal](sales-how-enable-payment-service-extensions.md).

target.mrk: Pro další informace navštivte [Povolte platby zákazníkům prostřednictvím služby PayPal](sales-how-enable-payment-service-extensions.md).

trans-unit.source: See Also

seg-source.mrk: See Also

target.mrk: Viz také
